name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Viz Swipe - Touch & Click Page Turns

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds swipe or click functionality for page navigation on Viz Media manga pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily navigate through your favorite manga on Viz.com with Viz Swipe. Whether you're using a touch device or a mouse, this extension allows you to turn pages effortlessly with simple swipe or click gestures. The navigation areas are invisible for your benefit, ensuring a seamless and unobtrusive reading experience on any device. Perfect for manga enthusiasts who want a smooth, immersive reading experience.
